resources.string: ex: Indian at E Chestnut St

This app shows the next 5 buses scheduled to stop at a selected WTA bus stop (Whatcom County). You may browse stops by category on the Browse tab, you may also search for an intersection via the Search tab. Currently, searching for landmarks does not work.


Tap on a bus stop to view the next buses stopping there. From the Next Bus tab, you have the option to add/remove the stop from favorites, or refresh the displayed times. If these options are not displayed in the action bar, they will be accessible from the context menu.


For more information, DM @masenf or visit http://github.com/masenf/wta-next-bus
A new version of this application is available.%n%n Update #%d%n Download URL: %s%n
